extensionDescription.message: Add a context menu Open with VLC. Need HTTP enabled on VLC.

errorVLCHTTPNotStarted.message:
[Open with VLC]
VLC HTTP Server is disabled.
Either start VLC, or enable HTTP server in settings (password must be set)
errorVLCHTTPNotStarted.description: Displayed when VLC is not started or HTTP is disabled.

errorVLCHTTPPromptWrongPassword.message:
[Open with VLC]
The password is incorrect.

errorVLCHTTPPromptPassword.message:
[Open with VLC]
Please enter the HTTP password.
errorVLCHTTPPromptPassword.description: Displayed when no password was set.

donationNotifcationTitle.description: Notification message when the extension is used successfully every X times

donationNotifcationMessage.message: If you want, you can donate to help me. Click here ;)
donationNotifcationMessage.description: Notification message when the extension is used successfully every X times
